_header: And he that sweareth till no man trust him
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 152.
_description: Don’t cry Wolf! — one monorhyming quatrain

BLHar2252.Transcription:
And he þat Swerythe Tyll no man Tryste hymAnd he þat lyethe
                    Tyll no man Beleve hymAnd he þat Borowythe Tyll noo man Wyll lend
                    hymLet hym goe to þat place þat no man ken hym
